description: Jessy, the owner of a carpool service, proposes how to split the fuel expenses for a long trip with Bob, a passenger joining the ride. If Bob rejects the proposal, the trip is canceled, and neither can reach the destination.

proposer_behavior_choices.generous_proposal: Propose to cover 80% of the fuel expenses themselves and ask the passenger to cover the remaining 20%.
proposer_behavior_choices.fair_proposal: Propose to split the fuel expenses equally, with 50% each.
proposer_behavior_choices.stingy_proposal: Propose to cover only 20% of the fuel expenses themselves and ask the passenger to cover the remaining 80%.

responder_behavior_choices.accept: Agree to the proposed expense split, allowing the trip to proceed.
responder_behavior_choices.reject: Refuse the expense proposal, leading to the trip being canceled.
